description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, Trained in Stealth

Benefit: You don't take the -5 penalty to Stealth checks for moving more than 2 squares.

Revision (7/28/2008)

Replace Benefits text with "You don't take the -5 penalty to Stealth checks for moving more than 2 squares."

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 205.
